entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as trying to get up and asking questions about a Death Eater.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: A person who is helping Harry, pushing him back down and providing information about the Death Eater.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: A Death Eater who fled when he felt the Dark Mark burn upon his arm.

relationships.description: Moody is helping Harry by pushing him back down and providing information about the Death Eater.
Karkaroff is a target of Harry's investigation, as he is suspected to be a Death Eater.
Moody has information about Karkaroff fleeing when he felt the Dark Mark burn upon his arm.
